#summary Printing Running Slips and Score Sheets
= Printing Running Slips and Score Sheets =

[Contents Contents] [IndexPage Next]

The program can print running slips and score sheets from the entered information. Use print preview and check the margins, page boundaries and turn off headers and footers.
